MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith, affecting properties in John Humble Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:55PM. Our engineers have arrived on site in the  local area to investigate and repair the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:31 PM on Sunday, 11 October 2020.
